channel.title: curious on 采采流水
channel.description: Recent content in curious on 采采流水

item.title: Encryption
item.description: State “DONE” from “TODO” [2019-12-16 Mon 00:34] Symmetric Cryptography openssl aes-256-cbc -a -e -in file-in.txt -inkey key.txt -out file-out.txt openssl aes-256-cbc -a -d -in file-in.txt -inkey key.txt -out file-out.txt Asymmetric Cryptography generate private key openssl genrsa -out private.pem 1024 generate public key from private key openssl rsa -in private.pem -pubout -out public.pem encrypt file with public key openssl rsautl -encrypt -in test.org -inkey public.pem -pubin -out encrypted.inc decrypt file wiht private key openssl rsatul -decrypt -in encrypted.
